messages.subject: RE: [nihontostudy] Chuck Granick's Tsuba Descriptions  (2)
messages.msgSnippet: Chuck, you needed this to go direct to Richard at: [ rkg@teleport.com ]( mailto:rkg@teleport.com ) Ron H. ... From: Charles Granick cgranick@optonline.net
messages.messageBody:
Chuck, you needed this to go direct to Richard at: rkg@... 

Ron H. 

 

-----Original Message-----
From: "Charles Granick cgranick@... [nihontostudy]" <nihontostudy@yahoogroups.com>
Sent: Wednesday, October 21, 2015 6:57pm
To: "Richard George rkg@... [nihontostudy]" <nihontostudy@yahoogroups.com>
Subject: [nihontostudy] Chuck Granick's Tsuba Descriptions (2)

 

Richard,
I've attached 2 word documents to correspond to my 3 tsuba for the 2016 KTK catalog. As I have never done this before. I would appreciate your comments before they go to Nick. I've also attached a photo of the Hosokawa Sansai tsuba that I reference in my article about the same' tsuba. I know that you mentioned that Nick might have an issue with including it, but I think that it would add value to the description.

Regards,
Chuck Granick

----------

[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
